title: New: Church Spires – Islandic
body:
Photo by [Jackson Bowley](http://cargocollective.com/jacksonbowley)

The sun is setting, I have a pizza on in the oven and I’m getting ready to meet an old friend this evening. I was pretty stoked on today as it was, and then **Blackbird Blackbird** decided to go and make it all even more delicious by dropping the first track off his side project, **[Church Spires.](http://churchspires.bandcamp.com/)**

Centered around a central reverberating melody, the cut creates has a striking resemblance to the brief moment between afternoon and night, the exact moment we’re all experiencing right now. A sudden gear change; breathing in to relax, breathing out in excitement.
